These General Terms and Conditions (GTC): These General Terms and Conditions (GTC) apply to all business relationships between us and our customers. The customer's terms and conditions shall only apply if we have expressly agreed to their validity.

For slight negligence, we shall only be liable for damages resulting from injury to life, body or health, or from the breach of a material contractual obligation.

If you withdraw from this contract, we s: If you withdraw from this contract, we shall reimburse you all payments received from you, including the costs of delivery (with the exception of the supplementary costs resulting from your choice of a type of delivery other than the least expensive type of standard delivery offered by us), without undue delay and in any event not later than fourteen days from the day on which we are informed about your decision to withdraw from this contract.

Wir bieten umfassende Ausbildungen und Q: We offer comprehensive training and qualifications for drivers of all classes - from beginners to professional drivers.
Fahrschule – Klassen B, BE & A: Driving School – Classes B, BE & A
Ob Auto, Anhänger oder Motorrad – wir bi: Whether car, trailer, or motorcycle – we provide safe and targeted training. Our experienced instructors accompany you from the first theory lesson to the successful driving test.
Ausbildung für PKW (Klasse B), Anhänger: Training for cars (Class B), trailers (BE), and motorcycles (A)
Theorie- und Praxisunterricht mit modern: Theory and practical lessons with modern vehicles
Pflichtseminar nach dem Führerschein auf: Mandatory seminar for probationary license holders – professional, comprehensible, and with personal support.
Teilnahmebescheinigung für die Führersch: Certificate of participation for the licensing authority
Lerne in nur einem Tag, wie du im Notfal: Learn in just one day how to respond correctly in emergencies – a must for every license applicant and valuable for life.
Sicherheit beginnt bei der Ausrüstung –: Safety begins with equipment – we train and test the proper handling of lifting equipment according to DGUV guidelines.
Pflichtschulungen für Berufskraftfahrer: Mandatory training for professional drivers according to BKrFQG: We offer all 5 modules as well as accelerated initial qualification.
Wir bereiten Ihre Mitarbeiter optimal au: We optimally prepare your employees for the safe handling of industrial trucks (e.g., forklifts) and long trucks.
Lang-LKW-Schulung inkl. Fahrsimulator-Ei: Long truck training including driving simulator use

Wählen Sie das passende Paket für Ihre A: Choose the right package for your training. Unsure which one is right for you? Contact us for personal advice.

Wie lange dauert die Führerscheinausbild: How long does the driver's license training take?
Die Dauer der Ausbildung hängt von Ihrer: The duration of training depends on your availability and learning progress. With regular participation in classes and weekly driving lessons, training can be completed in 3-6 months. With our intensive course, completion is possible within 3-4 weeks.
Welche Unterlagen benötige ich für die A: What documents do I need for registration?
Für die Anmeldung benötigen Sie einen gü: For registration, you need a valid ID card or passport, a biometric passport photo, a vision test from an optician or doctor, and proof of a first aid course. For license extensions, please also bring your current driver's license.
Wann findet der Theorieunterricht statt?: When does theory instruction take place?
Unser regulärer Theorieunterricht findet: Our regular theory lessons take place Monday to Thursday from 6:00 PM to 7:30 PM. For working professionals and students, we also offer classes on Saturdays. For intensive courses, theory units take place daily in the mornings.
Können Fahrstunden auch am Wochenende st: Can driving lessons also take place on weekends?
Ja, wir bieten nach Absprache auch Fahrs: Yes, we also offer driving lessons on Saturdays by arrangement. However, these must be planned in advance. For intensive courses, our driving instructors are also available on weekends to help you get your license in the shortest possible time.
Kontaktieren Sie uns noch heute, um Ihre: Contact us today to begin your training or learn more about our offerings.
